overview: What happens when sex superstar Alexis Texas meets rising star Alexis Ford for the first time? Their chemistry is smoking hot, and with 2 scorching scenes of these ass-tastic adult film femmes getting down and dirty with each other, they rock the screen. This scorching all sex movie also features Samantha Ryan (who for years only performed girl/girl scenes) in a blowing, balling, boy/girl bonanza not to be missed!
title: Alexis Meets Alexis
